io.s4.zeno
Interface Cluster

All Known Implementing Classes:
ZKCluster
public interface Cluster

Abstraction of a collection of Sites. Provides access to a list of names of all sites in the cluster, and access to a read-only copy of the information from all sites in the cluster.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Cluster.Site

Method Detail

getSite

Cluster.Site getSite(java.lang.String name)
Gets the information for a named node. The ConfigMap is backed by ZooKeeper. Updates are applied to it asynchronously.

Parameters:
name - node's name
Returns:
information for the node.
See Also:
ZKConfigMap

getAllSiteNames

java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllSiteNames()
Get names of all active sites in the cluster.

Returns:
list of all active site names.

getAllSites

java.util.List<Cluster.Site> getAllSites()
Get a list of all active sites in this cluster.

Returns:
all active sites.

addSite

WritableConfigMap addSite(Cluster.Site site)
Add a Site to a cluster. The name of the site is obtained from site.name(). A Writable config map is created for the site and returned. Writes to this config map become visible to other Sites in the cluster.

Parameters:
site -
Returns:

removeSite

void removeSite(Cluster.Site site)
Remove a site from the cluster.

Parameters:
site -
